name: RadMovie Video
summary: An RMV file is a video used by a Radical Entertainment video game, such as The Simpsons: Hit & Run and The Incredible Hulk: Ultimate Destruction. It contains a cutscene or other video played in the game.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
